directions: Pour almond milk, coffee, sugar, and cream cheese into large plastic cup; blend with an immersion blender until the cream cheese is completely blended into the liquid, about 1 minute. Pour the blended beverage into a tall glass with ice cubes.
ingredients: 3 packets granular no-calorie sucralose sweetener (such as Splenda®)
title: Iced Cappuccino - Low-Carb Alternative
